and sp.task_main_proof_id = #{id}
and spd.employee_no LIKE concat('%', #{employeeNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and spd.employee_name LIKE concat('%', #{employeeName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
